participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Jake enjoys music and sharing stories from his life.
participant_1.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i have short brown hair. i met taylor swift. i am a convenience store manager. my favourite music is country music.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Evelyn is spirited and nostalgic, with a zest for life that belies her years.
participant_2.background: i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

content.text: Hey! Are you a convenience store manager? Because I am.
I am a waitress at a local mall
This is all Elven to me.
That sounds fun ! I'm a fan of the outdoors myself
